```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#load packages
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

#load data
df <- import(here::here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
# Commit 4
df$month <- round_date(df$created_at, unit = "month")
df <- df %>% 
  filter(month < as_datetime("2019-01-01"))

```{r commit2}

df %>%
  count(screen_name) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  dplyr::slice(1:25) %>%
  mutate(screen_name = factor(screen_name)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = forcats::fct_reorder(screen_name, n), y = n)) +
    geom_col() +
    coord_flip()


```


numtweets <- df %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  count()

numtweets %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = month, y = n)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth()
```
